messages.content:
How do you say where’s Waldo in Slovenian 
Arabic
German French and other countries make a list of

Great question! “Where’s Waldo?” is localized differently around the world. Here's a list of the name and translation used in various countries, including the languages you asked for:

| **Country / Language**      | **Localized Name**     | **Translation of “Where’s Waldo?”**               |
|----------------------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| **United States** (English) | Waldo                 | Where’s Waldo?                                   |
| **United Kingdom** (British English) | Wally         | Where’s Wally?                                   |
| **France** (French)         | Charlie               | Où est Charlie ?                                 |
| **Germany** (German)        | Walter                | Wo ist Walter?                                   |
| **Slovenia** (Slovenian)    | Valdo                 | Kje je Valdo?                                     |
| **Arabic-speaking countries** (Arabic) | وليد (Waleed) or والس | أين وليد؟ or أين والس؟                           |
| **Italy** (Italian)         | Ubaldo                | Dov’è Ubaldo?                                    |
| **Spain** (Spanish)         | Wally                 | ¿Dónde está Wally?                               |
| **Portugal / Brazil** (Portuguese) | Wally         | Onde está o Wally?                               |
| **Netherlands** (Dutch)     | Wally                 | Waar is Wally?                                   |
| **Turkey** (Turkish)        | Veli                  | Veli Nerede?                                     |
| **Iceland** (Icelandic)     | Valli                 | Hvar er Valli?                                   |
| **Norway** (Norwegian)      | Willy                 | Hvor er Willy?                                   |
| **Finland** (Finnish)       | Vallu                 | Missä Vallu on?                                  |
| **Denmark** (Danish)        | Holger                | Hvor er Holger?                                  |
| **Sweden** (Swedish)        | Valle                 | Var är Valle?                                    |
| **Poland** (Polish)         | Waldo                 | Gdzie jest Waldo?                                |
| **Japan** (Japanese)        | ウォーリー (Wōrī)       | ウォーリーをさがせ！(Wōrī o sagase!)             |
| **Korea** (Korean)          | 월리를 찾아라! (Wolli) | Where is Wally?                                  |

Let me know if you want these turned into flashcards or pronounced for any of the languages!
